pullrequest.title: Model submission for X1 sensor configuration 6.

content.raw: 45 degrees is tolerable.  The only consideration here is that the angle needs to be at least greater than the maximum traversable slope \(probably 20-30 degrees maximum\) by some non-trivial amount to return a value that doesn’t result in a headache from edge cases and probably less than the overall slope of the stairs \(which would be 45 degrees if the stairs are uniform\).
content.html: 45 degrees is tolerable. The only consideration here is that the angle needs to be at least greater than the maximum traversable slope (probably 20-30 degrees maximum) by some non-trivial amount to return a value that doesn’t result in a headache from edge cases and probably less than the overall slope of the stairs (which would be 45 degrees if the stairs are uniform).
